nodes.label: Input Node
nodes.description: Handles data ingestion from various sources (text, JSON, CSV, numbers).

nodes.label: Preprocessing Node
nodes.description: Cleans, normalizes, and transforms data for AI processing.

nodes.label: Text Summarizer
nodes.description: Summarizes long text passages using a BART model.

nodes.label: Image Captioning
nodes.description: Generates a caption for an image from a URL.

nodes.label: Code Analyzer
nodes.description: Analyzes Python code for syntax errors and structure.

nodes.label: Sentiment Analysis
nodes.description: Analyzes text for sentiment (positive, negative, neutral).

nodes.label: Postprocessing Node
nodes.description: Processes and refines AI model outputs with aggregation and filtering.

nodes.label: Output Node
nodes.description: Formats and presents final workflow results in various formats.
